name: @cryptohub/coco
description: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox

scripts.build: npm run build-add-version && npm run build-clean && npm run build-css && npm run build-autoprefix && npm run build-cleancss && npm run build-sass
scripts.build-sass: cp -a style/. dist/sass/ && rc list=dist/sass/**/*.sass && spaces-to-tabs dist/sass/**/*.sass -s 2
scripts.pack: VER=$(echo $npm_package_version | sed s/[.]/-/g) && mv dist coco-v$npm_package_version && zip -r coco-v$VER.zip coco-v$npm_package_version && mv coco-v$npm_package_version dist
scripts.check-browsersync: ( npm list -g browser-sync ) || ( npm install -g browser-sync )
scripts.start: npm run build-css --watch && browser-sync start --config test/bs-config.js
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run check-browsersync && npm run build-docs && npm run compress
